lore: This rare specimen is believed to have a manufacturing defect. Self-aware, the Treasure Golem owes its name to the fact that it enjoys collecting bright objects, which is why many Magi actively hunt down these creatures for their loot. At night, it usually looks for a cave in which to light a fire so that it can stare at its belongings in the light of the flames until dawn.
menagerieDialog: (It's so still that you're not even sure it's still alive.)
(This creature has the best of intentions, but it always seems to be clumsily knocking things over.)
(Perhaps someday, you'll be able to take the time to teach it how to talk.)
(Its facial expressions are difficult to read. You can't help but think that it's judging you sometimes.)
name: Treasure Golem
